text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the DELL Inspiron 15 7000 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i5 6300HQ (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB 15.6" FHD 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. It overheats frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The build material has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the DELL Inspiron 15 7000 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i5 6300HQ (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB 15.6" FHD 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 960 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Battery drains incredibly fast, even on light tasks.. Looking to return it.

Had several issues with the DELL Inspiron 15 7000 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i5 6300HQ (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB 15.6" FHD 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit since day one. blue screens occasionally and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the DELL Inspiron 15 7000 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i5 6300HQ (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB 15.6" FHD 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 960 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the DELL Inspiron 15 7000 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i5 6300HQ (2.30 GHz) 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB 15.6" FHD 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 960 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.
